model:
GridSearchCV(cv=5,
             estimator=Pipeline(steps=[('tfidf', TfidfVectorizer()),
                                       ('clf', RandomForestClassifier())]),
             param_grid={'tfidf__max_df': [0.7, 0.8, 0.9],
                         'tfidf__max_features': [10000, 20000, 30000],
                         'tfidf__min_df': [5, 10],
                         'tfidf__ngram_range': [(1, 1), (1, 2)]},
             scoring='accuracy')
